thread.title: #ShoutYourAbortion

author: news24.com
title: #ShoutYourAbortion
text:
I do not agree with these reasons to try and justify murder.
For those women who were raped, there is the "morning-after-pill".
For those who indiscriminately sleep with just anyone without taking the necessary precautions to prevent pregnancy or even STDs, I say: Deal with it!
How do you know that the baby you aborted was not meant to find a cure for HIV/Aids one day, or for a rare Cancer? Pro-Choice should mean: take a decision before there is a another life involved!
